org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint

类 SavepointV2Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint.SavepointV2Serializer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SavepointSerializer<SavepointV2>

    class SavepointV2Serializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SavepointSerializer<SavepointV2>
    (De)serializer for checkpoint metadata format version 2.

    This format version adds

    Basic checkpoint metadata layout: 

      +--------------+---------------+-----------------+
  | checkpointID | master states | operator states |
  +--------------+---------------+-----------------+
  
  Master state:
  +--------------+---------------------+---------+------+---------------+
  | magic number | num remaining bytes | version | name | payload bytes |
  +--------------+---------------------+---------+------+---------------+

      • serialize

        public void serialize(SavepointV2 checkpointMetadata,
                      java.io.DataOutputStream dos)
               throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: SavepointSerializer
        Serializes a savepoint to an output stream.
        指定者:
        serialize 在接口中 SavepointSerializer<SavepointV2>
        参数:
        checkpointMetadata - Savepoint to serialize
        dos - Output stream to serialize the savepoint to
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Serialization failures are forwarded

      • deserialize

        public SavepointV2 deserialize(java.io.DataInputStream dis,
                               java.lang.ClassLoader cl)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: SavepointSerializer
        Deserializes a savepoint from an input stream.
        指定者:
        deserialize 在接口中 SavepointSerializer<SavepointV2>
        参数:
        dis - Input stream to deserialize savepoint from
        cl - the user code class loader
        返回:
        The deserialized savepoint
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Serialization failures are forwarded
